explains: v. 使……多样化（diversify 的过去分词）
wordGroup: diversified economy 多种经营；多种经济，多样化经济
diversified business 多种经营；多样化经营
diversified ownership 多种所有制形式；混合所有制

sentences.en: The culture has been diversified with the arrival of immigrants.
sentences.cn: 随着外来移民的到来，这里的文化变得多元化了。

sentences.en: The company's troubles started only when it diversified into new products.
sentences.cn: 该公司的麻烦从实现产品多样化时才开始。

sentences.en: City College of New York has one of the most diversified student bodies in the nation.
sentences.cn: 纽约城市大学有全美最多元化的学生群体之一。
